9839cdf app/src/main/java/net/programmierecke/radiodroid2/utils/CustomFilter.java (<eulerhm@dcc.ufmg.br> 2023-01-03 215)         public void handleMessage(Message msg) {
9839cdf app/src/main/java/net/programmierecke/radiodroid2/utils/CustomFilter.java (<eulerhm@dcc.ufmg.br> 2023-01-03 216)             int what = msg.what;
9839cdf app/src/main/java/net/programmierecke/radiodroid2/utils/CustomFilter.java (<eulerhm@dcc.ufmg.br> 2023-01-03 217)             Message message;
9839cdf app/src/main/java/net/programmierecke/radiodroid2/utils/CustomFilter.java (<eulerhm@dcc.ufmg.br> 2023-01-03 218)             switch (what) {
9839cdf app/src/main/java/net/programmierecke/radiodroid2/utils/CustomFilter.java (<eulerhm@dcc.ufmg.br> 2023-01-03 219)                 case FILTER_TOKEN:
